## About Me
My name is [**Tejas Mundhe**](https://github.com/TejasMundhe), an incoming sophomore at Walnut Hills High School in Cincinnati Ohio with an interest in Data Science, Computer Science, and Robotics. I also enjoy sports, playing video games, and reading in my free time.

## About this Project
This project, *Global Internet Usage* is made up of a multitude interactive or animated plots and models. This was made as my final project for the Stanford Pre-Collegiate Institutes Introduction to Data Science Course.

## Goals
+ Continue my journey into the world of Data Science
+ Practice making larger projects which are easily acessible online
+ Practice using Distill and Modeling techniques to apply what I've learned
+ Observe Gapminder and Country Internet data in a meaningful way
